entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 7:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening then 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
